attributes.action: Recognise that the "special relationship" has never existed and act always in the the UKs interests rather than the USA's
attributes.additional_details: The special relationship has not existed since the late 60's. The UK should always act in the UK s interest rather than the US. I am not saying we should leave NATO but the US has taken UK participation for granted. Yet when a demand is made of them from the the UK side any response is not forthcoming.
